From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To configure the URL of the Intelligent Download Application (IDA) running on www.cisco.com, use the **autoupgrade ida url** command in global configuration mode. The router will send the image download requests to the configured URL. To disable this URL, use the **no** form of this command.
Examples: The following example shows how to configure the URL for the IDA server:
ExtraInfo: Use the **autoupgrade ida url** command to configure a new URL for the IDA server, if it is not present in the default location.

Configures the address to which the status email is to be sent.
Downloads a Cisco IOS software image directly from www.cisco.com or from a non-Cisco server.
